author: barnabasbusa
content: for devnet 10, we would like to configure this max churn limit to 4, so we could do a test on a smaller testnet. This shouldn't cause any issues for any CLs right?

author: barnabasbusa
content:
The plan is to launch the chain with 330k validators, which will increase the default 4 churn limit to 5 pre deneb. 
Start making deposits, verify that we are processing deposits and 5 exits pre deneb
Schedule deneb to epoch 256 (or maybe even higher, to ensure deposits and exists are going to be processed)
Once deneb hits, we want to make sure that exists are still processed 5 at each epoch, but deposits are now limited to 4. Afaik the number of exists are not going to be effected by this churn limit change.
